checkout.summary: Checkout the source code for the Java-based Jenkins example.
notes: Use Jenkins credentials for private repositories; do not hardcode tokens.

setup.summary: Prepare a Maven project and install dependencies using 'mvn clean compile'.
notes: This corresponds to the original 'Compile Stage' stage in the Jenkinsfile.

build.summary: Build and package the Java application using Maven.
notes: This corresponds to the original 'Deployment Stage' stage in the Jenkinsfile.

test.summary: Run unit tests and integration tests using Maven.
notes: This aggregates the original 'Testing Stage' and some of the 'Deployment Stage'.
